name: ‎1160 1160X Upgraded Magnetic Engine Block Heater, 120V 400W, Compatible with Many Vehicles, Equipment, Components, Etc
short_description: 【Broad Application Scope】: The magnetic heater is an excellent option for heating engine blocks of all sizes—be they large or compact—across an extensive variety of vehicles and machinery. This list includes tractors, snowmobiles, motorcycles, snow blowers, generators, and agricultural equipment, in addition to oil pans, transmissions, and hydraulic systems. Furthermore, it proves ideal for machinery maintenance and repair tasks.

【Smart Temperature Regulation】​Equipped with a built-in thermostat, the magnetic heater provides reliable overheating protection through intelligent operation. It automatically powers off when the temperature reaches 266℉ and resumes heating once the temperature drops to 140℉, ensuring safer and more dependable performance throughout its use.

【Hassle-Free Setup】​ Boasting a robust magnetic base, the heater attaches firmly to metal surfaces, eliminating the need for any mechanical installation. This exceptional user-friendliness translates to quick, trouble-free setup, helping users save both time and effort in daily operations.

【Durable Craftsmanship】​ Constructed with high-quality sturdy materials, the heater features a practical heat-resistant handle for comfortable and safe grip. Engineered for long-term durability, its strong magnetic base and heat-resistant structure ensure the heater stays securely in place and operates efficiently even in harsh working environments.

【Reliable After-Sales Service】​ We are committed to providing top-tier after-sales support. Should you encounter any issues during the product's installation or usage, please contact us promptly. We promise to respond within 24 hours and spare no effort in assisting you with resolving your problems.

name: Rsept Engine Heater,Car Engine Oil Heater Pad,5.6 Ft Silicone Heater Pad with Heat Protector 120W Cord Length,Engine Heater Oil Pan Heater Pad Replacement Magnetic Block Heater (1 Pack)
short_description: [Package Included] The package contains 2 car heaters, each with 70 inch wires to meet your daily needs.

[High Quality Material] It is made of high quality silica gel, which is waterproof and oil proof. The waterproof design of silica gel and power cord connection reduces the risk of short circuit. It has high thermal efficiency conversion and very fast heating speed, stable performance and even heat transfer.

[Function] In winter, the lubrication and working efficiency of the fluid in the engine and gearbox are improved, the wear of the equipment is reduced, and the service life of the engine and gearbox is extended.

[Easy to Install] The back of the heating pad is equipped with self-adhesive adhesive, which can be easily fixed on the surface of the item. Clean and dry the flat surface of the equipment before use, peel off the paper back and coat the oil pan heater, plug the 120V power cord into the socket, and heat for 10 to 15 minutes. You can also use magnets/adhesives to extend the bonding time (products do not include magnets and adhesives)

[Widely Applicable] The light and flexible heater can quickly provide heat where it is needed. It is used to heat the fluid on any metal surface, such as engine oil sump, transmission, diesel tractor engine, snow blower, generator, etc.; Only for metal surfaces: Keep away from plastic; Note: The temperature is extremely high, please do not touch.

name: 2PCS Engine Block Heater Oil Pan Heater Pad with Thermostat 120V 150W 4 X 5 Inch 3M Self-Adhesive Metal Surface Dipstick Engine Block Silicone Heating Pad with 68 Inch Long Power Cord
short_description: Rapid Engine Preheating-In severe winter,this oil pan heater pad can raise the engine oil temperature to the optimal starting level in just 5 minutes.It significantly improves lubricating oil fluidity,reduces cold-start wear, and extends engine lifespan

Smart Temperature Control Protection-Equipped with a built-in automatic constant temperature controller,our engine heater pad automatically powers off when the temperature reaches 194°F (90°C) and resumes heating when it drops below 122°F (50°C).This effectively prevents overheating risks and ensures safe use

Self-Adhesive & Easy Installation-The back of engine block heater pad is equipped with strong 3M adhesive.Simply clean the metal surface,peel off the protective film,and paste it firmly.It is suitable for metal surfaces such as engine oil pans,transmissions,and fuel tanks

Safety Usage Reminder -This engine heater pad is ONLY for use on metal surfaces.Do not stick it on plastic parts or near air inlets.Ensure the surface is clean and free of oil stains before use.It is recommended to apply high-temperature sealant around the edges to enhance adhesion (sealant not included)

Convenient Use & Comprehensive After-Sales Service-Our block heater for diesel engine comes with a 68-inch (approximately 1.7 meters) UL-certified power cord.The plug is standard,allowing easy connection to household sockets.It is convenient to use without the need for modifications.Covered with high-grade silicone,it features oil resistance,acid resistance, water resistance,and low-temperature resistance.It adapts to various harsh environments,offering a long service life and high reliability
